detail_desc: Shimmering metallic imitation leather sandals with an ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening. Imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Jacket in soft Tencel™ lyocell twill with a collar and zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front. Chest pockets, flap front pockets, a concealed drawstring at the waist and a press-stud at the cuffs. Unlined.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and smocked back. Seam at the waist and a gently bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Dressing gown in soft fleece with a hood and detachable tie belt at the waist.
5-pocket jeans in washed superstretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button and super-skinny legs with raw-edge hems.
Ankle-length treggings in stretch twill with a slight sheen. Regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening, a zip fly, fake back pockets and slim legs.
Longer-style, 5-pocket shorts in washed cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and frayed, raw-edge hems.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft cotton jersey with a decorative lace trim and bow at the top, and press-studs at the crotch.
Jeans in soft, patterned stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist and fake fly with a press-stud. Fake front pockets, real back pockets, and slim legs with narrow hems.
Sports shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and reflective detail.
Small shoulder bag in soft imitation suede with fringing on one side, a zip at the top and a narrow shoulder strap with press-studs at one end to adjust the strap length. Lined. Size 1x15x18.5 cm.
Lace thong briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front, a yoke at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Shopper in grained imitation leather with imitation suede inside and two handles at the top. Unlined. Size 16x28x38 cm.
Dress in woven fabric with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, 3/4-length sleeves with a flounced trim, and a flounce at the hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Dresses in soft, organic cotton jersey with a round neckline, short sleeves, a gathered seam at the top and a gently flared skirt. One dress has an all-over print.
Hat in a fine-knit cotton blend with decorative rabbit ears on top, a ribbed hem and a strap with hook and loop fastening under the chin. Cotton jersey lining.
Biker jacket in imitation suede with a diagonal zip at the front, side pockets and ribbed jersey sections under the arms. Lined.
Jumper in a soft, chunky knit containing some wool with a ribbed turtle neck, low dropped shoulders,long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Jumper in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Hard-worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a press-stud. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow, cut-off, raw-edge hems.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend in various colours and designs.
Soft, transparent silicone smartphone case. Fits iPhone 6/7.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets, seams at the knees and ribbed hems.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with lace details, a round neckline and long sleeves.

V-neck blouse in soft, patterned fabric with a draped, wrapover front that has covered buttons at one side. Buttons on the inside and at the top, and long puff sleeves with reinforced shoulder sections.
Cotton jersey boxer briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a small frill trim at the waist and narrow ties at the sides.
Jacket in woven fabric with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the front, notch lapels and a single back vent. Lined.
Straight trousers in washed cotton twill with a soft brushed finish. Adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, and front and back pockets.
Short shorts in jersey made from a cotton blend containing glittery threads with a high, elasticated waist and side pockets.
Knee-length dress in a fluffy knit containing glittery threads with a ribbed polo neck, dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with flounced sleeves in woven fabric with embroidery and scalloped edges.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket.in a straight-cut, gently tapered fit. Yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Knee-length dress in satin with a V-neck opening and narrow ties at the front, cap sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist and softly draping skirt. Unlined.
Wide trousers in a soft viscose weave with a regular, elasticated paper bag waist, sewn-in tie belt and side pockets.
Scarf in a pleated weave with raw, frayed edges on the short sides. Size 80x150 cm.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a boat neck and 3/4-length sleeves. Ribbed trim at the neckline, and a rounded hem.
Knee-length, asymmetric skirt in a patterned viscose weave with a concealed zip in one side, partial wrapover at the front and wide flounce at the hem. Lined.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Polo shirt in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed collar and button placket.
Round plastic earrings with hoop-shaped pendants. Length 4.5 cm.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric made from organic cotton with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Elasticated satin scrunchie.
Fine-knit shaftless socks with a silicone trim around the heel to hold them in place.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a small print motif on one sleeve, a seam centre front and an asymmetric hem. Longer at the back.
Lace thong briefs with a low waist, lined gusset,wide sides and string back.
Double-breasted coat in woven fabric with a brushed finish. Notch lapels, welt side pockets and a single back vent. Unlined.
Slim-fit trousers in stretch twill with a regular, adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, back pockets and narrow hems.
Cardigan in a soft, fine, fluffy knit. Deep V-neck, pearly buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.

Short shirt dress in softly draping woven fabric with a sheen. Collar, concealed buttons down the front and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Ballet pumps in imitation suede with a seam centre front and at the heels. Imitation leather insoles.

Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and an open back pocket. Text print on one leg and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems with the reverse side showing.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine, fluffy knit with a straight hem and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Fleece mittens with elasticated cuffs.
V-neck jumpsuit in woven fabric with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist, pockets in the side seams and slightly wider straight legs.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
High-waisted leggings in microfibre with a wide waist panel. The leggings are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.

Pyjamas with a shirt and shorts in soft cotton jersey. Shirt with rounded notch lapels, buttons down the front and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Shorts with an elasticated waist and frill-trimmed hems.
Lined bikini top with adjustable shoulder straps and underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Metal fastener at the back.

Lightly padded bomber jacket with a lined, detachable hood in sweatshirt fabric and a ribbed stand-up collar. Zip down the front with a chin guard, side pockets with a press-stud and a zipped pocket on one sleeve. Gathered seams down the sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Rugby shirt in soft organic cotton jersey with a ribbed collar, button placket and long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs.
Fitted top in a soft rib knit with a V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and buttons down the front.
Short-sleeved shirt in an organic cotton weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Yoke at the back, an open chest pocket and a gently rounded hem.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with low heels and fluted soles. The boots are made partly from recycled polyester.
Relaxed-fit shorts in a rustle-weave cotton blend with an elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and welt back pockets with a press-stud.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and skinny legs.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch denim with hard-worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y) and zip fly and button. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Set with a T-shirt and pair of cycling shorts in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt with a print motif on the front and a narrow trim around the neckline. Cycling shorts with an elasticated waist.
Short, chunky-knit jumper in a cotton blend with braided details at the top and raglan sleeves.
Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend.
Long-sleeved top and a pair of trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric. Top with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.

Short dress in airy, patterned chiffon with a V-neck and wrapover front with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, a tie belt at the waist and a pleated skirt. Partly lined.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch cotton and Tencel™ lyocell weave with narrow notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny Fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar and classic front. Yoke with a pleat at the back, a chest pocket, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Satin-covered Alice band with glittery snowflakes on the top.

Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with an opening and woven ties at the back of the neck, gathers in the sides for a good fit over the tummy and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Set with dungarees and a long-sleeved top. Dungarees with a press-stud on the shoulders and ribbed hems. Top in cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder.
Hat in braided paper straw with a raw edge. Width of brim approx. 12 cm.
